VersionInfo.Title: Markdown Monster 1.28 is now available
VersionInfo.Detail: Recent updates add a new redesigned table editor, a switch to track the active document in the Folder Browser, project and folder level configuration overrides, improved folder browser file search, integrated 'web search & link' for link generation, many preview sync improvements and much more. For more detailed release info please see: https://github.com/RickStrahl/MarkdownMonster/blob/master/Changelog.md
